statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_history WHERE policy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM legislative_history WHERE approval_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM legislative_history WHERE approval_status = FALSE AND policy_type = 'Regulation' ORDER BY enactment_date DESC
SELECT policy_name FROM legislative_history WHERE enactment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type FROM legislative_history ORDER BY policy_id
SELECT * FROM legislative_history WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM legislative_history WHERE policy_type = 'Law' ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type FROM legislative_history WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY enactment_date;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, approval_status FROM legislative_history WHERE policy_type = 'Act' AND approval_status = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type FROM legislative_history ORDER BY policy_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT name, party FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Republican' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, state FROM legislators WHERE position = 'Senator' LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_name, enacted_date FROM policies WHERE enacted_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY enacted_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY state, name DESC;
SELECT name, party, state FROM legislators WHERE state = 'California' OR state = 'New York';

SELECT legislators.name, legislators.party, policies.policy_name FROM legislators INNER JOIN policies ON legislators.id = policies.id WHERE policies.enacted_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT legislators.name AS legislator_name, policies.policy_name AS policy_name, policies.description AS policy_description FROM legislators LEFT JOIN policies ON legislators.id = policies.id;
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id, MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT id, name, party FROM PolicyMakers WHERE party='Republican';
SELECT description, date_passed FROM Legislation WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDecisions WHERE decision='Approved';
SELECT title, decision_date FROM Legislation ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE party = 'Democrat';
SELECT name, district FROM PolicyMakers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Legislation WHERE date_passed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, description FROM Legislation WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT p.name, l.title, pd.decision FROM PolicyMakers p JOIN PolicyDecisions pd ON p.id = pd.decision_maker_id JOIN Legislation l ON pd.legislation_id = l.id;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT id, name, role FROM policy_makers WHERE role='Senator';
SELECT * FROM legislative_history ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, event FROM legislative_history WHERE event LIKE '%passed%';
SELECT policy_id, decision, outcome FROM policy_decisions WHERE outcome='Approved';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT name, role FROM policy_makers ORDER BY role, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_history WHERE event = 'Passed' AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT party FROM policy_makers;
SELECT p.name, h.event, d.decision FROM policy_makers p JOIN legislative_history h ON p.id = h.policy_id JOIN policy_decisions d ON p.id = d.policy_id ORDER BY h.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT name, role FROM policy_makers ORDER BY role DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_history WHERE date > '2020-01-01' AND action = 'Passed';
SELECT policy_id, decision, impact FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision = 'Approved';
SELECT trend_name FROM policy_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers WHERE role='Legislator';
SELECT name, role FROM policy_makers WHERE id=1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM policy_trends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT id, action FROM legislative_history WHERE date='2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, decision, impact FROM policy_decisions WHERE policy_id=2;
